Christopher Kraich

  1. Alternate Birth Name: [Chris]
  2. Foster Name: Christopher
  3. Foster Family: Charles L. and Lova Cloud Unterkircher
  4. Location of Family: Tecumseh, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: 1905-06-27, Brooklyn, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1976-03-31
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242; National Orphan Train Complex; Find-A-Grave for Chris Kraich, Sr.; Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914.
